snippet: The company said that the Food and Drug Administration rejected its application saying too much information was missing from studies to accurately gauge the drug’s benefit.
lead_paragraph: The company said that the Food and Drug Administration rejected its application saying too much information was missing from studies to accurately gauge the drug’s benefit.

headline.main: Still No Expansion for Johnson & Johnson Blood Thinner
headline.print_headline: Still No Expansion For J.&J. Blood Thinner
